subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: From Seattle to Miami, rather than root for a win, fans root for Stanford quarterback Andrew Luck, fearing a few victories might cost them a shot at him in next year’s draft.
snippet: From Seattle to Miami, rather than root for a win, fans root for Stanford quarterback Andrew Luck, fearing a few victories might cost them a shot at him in next year’s draft.
